name: CreateNewZohoItem
description:
Create a new item in Zoho Books inventory.

Use this tool to create a new item in Zoho Books. This is useful for adding products or services to your Zoho inventory for tracking purposes.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization in Zoho Books.

parameters.name: item_details_json
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the item's attributes, including name, rate, description, tax details, locations, and more.

tax_id.description: ID of the tax to be associated to the item.

initial_stock_rate.description: Unit price of the opening stock.

purchase_tax_rule_id.description: Id of the purchase tax rule

sales_tax_rule_id.description: Id of the sales tax rule

sku.description: SKU value of item,should be unique throughout the product

product_type.description:
Specify the type of an item. Allowed values:
goods or service or digital_service.
For SouthAfrica Edition: service, goods, capital_service and capital_goods

sat_item_key_code.description: Add SAT Item Key Code for your goods/services. Download the CFDI Catalogs.

unitkey_code.description: Add Unit Key Code for your goods/services. Download the CFDI Catalogs.

is_taxable.description: Boolean to track the taxability of the item.

tax_exemption_id.description: ID of the tax exemption. Mandatory, if is_taxable is false.

purchase_tax_exemption_id.description: ID of the purchase tax exemption. Mandatory, if is_taxable is false.

account_id.description: ID of the account to which the item has to be associated with.

avatax_tax_code.description: A tax code is a unique label used to group Items (products, services, or charges) together. Max-length [25]

avatax_use_code.description: Used to group like customers for exemption purposes. It is a custom value that links customers to a tax rule. Select from Avalara [standard codes][1] or enter a custom code. Max-length [25]

item_type.description: Type of the item. Allowed values: sales,purchases,sales_and_purchases and inventory. Default value will be sales.

purchase_account_id.description: ID of the COGS account to which the item has to be associated with. Mandatory, if item_type is purchase / sales and purchase / inventory.

inventory_account_id.description: ID of the stock account to which the item has to be associated with. Mandatory, if item_type is inventory.

tax_id.description: ID of the tax to be associated to the item.

tax_specification.description: Set whether the tax type is intra/interstate

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the zoho-books API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
